metadata.Name: AceGPT
metadata.Description: AceGPT is a dataset for localizing large language models in Arabic. It consists of 50k Arabic social media posts with dialect annotations.
metadata.Paper Title: AceGPT, Localizing Large Language Models in Arabic
Affiliations: Qatar Computing Research Institute, Hamad Bin Khalifa University
metadata.Abstract: Large language models (LLMs) have demonstrated remarkable capabilities in various natural language processing tasks. However, their performance often degrades when applied to low-resource languages like Arabic, particularly when dealing with dialectal variations. To address this challenge, we introduce AceGPT, a new dataset specifically designed for localizing LLMs in Arabic. AceGPT comprises 50k Arabic social media posts annotated with dialect labels, covering a wide range of Arabic dialects. We conduct experiments to demonstrate the effectiveness of fine-tuning LLMs on AceGPT, showing significant improvements in dialect identification and downstream tasks such as sentiment analysis and language modeling. Our results highlight the importance of dialect-aware localization for enhancing the performance of LLMs in Arabic.
